titleStmt.title: The doctrine of the Sabbath· Delivered in the Act at Oxon. anno, 1622. By Dr. Prideaux his Majesties professour for divinity in that Vniversity. And now translated into English for the benefit of the common people.
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1578-1650.
Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Henry Seile, and are to be sold his shop at the signe of the Tygers-head. in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: Of the Sabbath.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Tygers-head. in St. Pauls Church-yard
